creator: Toolbox Group
descriptionHtml:
Savills Insights an application for the employees of a commercial centre (merchants, service providers, management teams).

The Savills Insights application includes the tools necessary for an employee or a store manager to communicate effectively with the management team of the commercial centre, at any time and anywhere, thanks to its Smartphone compatible format, accessible from the Internet.

Here is an overview of the features of Savills Insights:

Centre news: Savills Insights allows you to have access at any time to the latest information on the Commercial Centre (e.g. special openings, security info)

Tickets: Savills Insights allows you to inform the management teams of the Commercial Centre in the event of a maintenance, cleaning or security issue in a shop or the common areas.

Marketing: Savills Insights sends you the latest information on events and marketing operations (e.g. market research, mystery shopper surveys, events).

Employee Space: With Savills Insights, find the latest events and reductions intended exclusively for employees of the shopping centre.

Job offers: Publish your job offers on Savills Insights and let employees share them with their friends and family!

Documents: Find all the relevant documents on the shopping centre with one click thanks to Savills Insights.

Profiles: Manage your team directly from the Savills Insights application and the information on your staff.

Contacts: Savills Insights allows you to stay in contact with the SCM teams and find the appropriate contacts for your projects.

Download your application now (access is available only if your commercial centre is equipped with the Savills Insights solution).

Once registered, your store manager will give you access to the tool to be able to use the Savills Insights application.
descriptionShort: Savills Insights to your shopping centre
